name: L.O.N.E.R.
description:
L.O.N.E.R. Pre-Alpha version.

v0.0000000002

Bleak stalker-like TPS.

Focus on immersion and atmosphere.

Survive, kill, loot, respect the Zone.

Main Programmer: Lovro Tokić

Lead Dev: Borna Milinović

Main Sound/UI: Nikola Klemić

Level Design: Antonio Mirt, Ivan Maršanić

This project was presented as the final project for conclusion of educational program "INKUBATOR - PISMO"  for "Unity/C# game developer".

Thanks to Dominik Cvetkovski and Mario Čelan.

<3
